about_the_game: The official digital soundtrack for HuniePop 2: Double Date including all 30 booty bouncing tropical tracks from the game and 3 exclusive bonus tracks! A sweeping soundscape inspired by a mix of seaside styles including Hawaiian, Caribbean and classic American surf rock.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains adult content including frequent nudity, sexual dialog, sexual scenes/scenarios, references to drug/alcohol use, and anime boobies.

detailed_description: The official digital soundtrack for HuniePop 2: Double Date including all 30 booty bouncing tropical tracks from the game and 3 exclusive bonus tracks! A sweeping soundscape inspired by a mix of seaside styles including Hawaiian, Caribbean and classic American surf rock.
name: HuniePop 2: Double Date OST

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 2 GB available space
